column1:
CALL apoc.uuid.install(label, {addToExistingNodes: true/false, uuidProperty: 'uuid'}) yield label, installed, properties,
                                    batchComputationResult
column2: it will add the uuid transaction handler for the provided label and uuidProperty, in case the UUID handler is already present it will be replaced by the new one

column1: CALL apoc.uuid.remove(label) yield label, installed, properties
column2: remove previously added uuid handler and returns uuid information. All the existing uuid properties are left as-is

column1: CALL apoc.uuid.removeAll() yield label, installed, properties
column2: removes all previously added uuid handlers and returns uuids information. All the existing uuid properties are left as-is
